UI: Content Card

Statistic Card

The Statistic Card displays KPIs, analytics, and dashboard widgets. Features metric name, current value, unit of measurement, trend direction (up/down/stable), comparison period, target/goal value, and optional chart/visualization. Uses Schema.org/Observation markup.
